Description of osi_boron

Elise van Eynde & Gerard Ros

2025-05-26

description_osi_boron.Rmd

This document explains how the boron indicator is calculated for each country and provides references

Netherlands:

Belgium (Flanders):

France:

Principle:

For sunflower, rapeseed and faba beans (feverole), the B supply is evaluated based on the B measured in hot water (mg/kg). Below this threshold, fertilization may be needed. The index was calculated based on these threshold values using a logistic function, and giving score 1 when concentration is higher than the threshold.

Thresholds depend on soil type: 1.2 for argilo calcaires, 0.8 for other soils. We included clay > 50 for clay soils with threshold 1.2 and 0.8 for other soils.

Source: https://www.arvalis.fr/infos-techniques/carences-en-oligo-elements-reperer-les-situations-risque-grace-lanalyse-de-terre
